projects.title: Fresh Family Photo
projects.bodyText:
- Photography job platform single page app made in **React**
 -  Users can create job posts as a job poster or apply as a photographer.
 - Dynamic user interface and functionality based on user type.

projects.title: InsightInk
projects.bodyText:
- A dynamic journaling web app made using **Django** to suit anyone's journaling needs. People can create multiple journals, multiple entries per journal, and view entries displayed dynamically based on the template chosen.
 - Collaborated with team member from start to finish.
 - Deployed on **heroku** using **gunicorn**.

projects.title: Food Inventory
projects.bodyText:
- A full stack app that aids users in tracking their food inventory at home.
 - Multiple tracking properties, sorting functionality, and expiration tracking to aid the user in keeping their food inventory fresh, organized, and full.

projects.title: Blackjack
projects.bodyText:
- A web browser Blackjack game.
 - Double down, dealer messaging, wagering, and buy back-in features.
 - Created using vanilla **javascript**.

projects.title: Finch Collector
projects.bodyText:
- A full crud python app.
 - One:many & many:many relationships incorporated between entities.
 - App to track pets, their feedings, and their toys.

projects.title: Tic-Tac-Toe
projects.bodyText:
- A web browser game of tic-tac-toe.
 - Created using vanilla **javascript**.

projects.title: MERN Infrastructure Template
projects.bodyText:
- MERN stack template created for starting new MERN stack projects.
 - JWT implemented for auth & security
